name: Cake for Traveler
desc:
A gift given to a very special someone on a very special day.

Here's to you, who listens to the song of the ocean tides with a tranquil heart.

Wishing you a joyous journey in this great big world.

value.text: Log in to Genshin Impact on your birthday from September 28, 2024 - September 27, 2025

customize.text: is used, the player receives a

customize.name: Fragile Resin
customize.desc:
An item used to restore Original Resin by 60 points.

This crystalline substance pulsates with a little energy that can be absorbed by Original Resin. The flow of energies of all sorts is the source of many wonders and challenges in the world. Those same energies are also contained within this crystal.

customize.text:
and a copy of the cake as a memento. Its description also changes to the following:
<color=#ffffff>New Description</color>
A gift given to a very special someone on a very special day.
Here's to you, who listens to the song of the ocean tides with a tranquil heart.
Wishing you a joyous journey in this great big world.
"Every week, the recommended dishes get updated. Every month, the moon sends down new blessings â€” but wow, it's going to be almost nine thousand more hours before we can celebrate this day again! Just like Leisurely Otters are always accompanied by their seashells, Paimon will always be by your side!"
